title: A Country Christmas
description: Romantic Irishman O'Rourke Callahan's courtship had been blindingly swift, utterly incendiary. Yet attorney Kate had believed in love, had trusted they'd be bound forever. Then, as suddenly as it crystallized, her innocent dream shattered. Her brand-new husband was arrested as a thief, the damning evidence made plain to her own horror-stricken eyes. Now Kate was spending their lovingly planned cozy English Christmas alone, the room's quaint tester bed an infuriatingly vivid reminder of her rascally ex-husband's sensual sway. Then handsome O'Rourke himself appeared, arousing dangerous hopes, arousing suspicions, arousing HER! And no matter how her principles prickled, Kate ached to share a canopy and comforter with the rouge she'd hoped would share her life....
author: Jessica St. James
